results.deck: Condemned is a first person horror game in which you play as detective Ethan Thomas who is on the hunt to find a mysterious serial killer amidst a rising tide of insanity and violence in Metro City.
results.name: Condemned: Criminal Origins

results.deck: Infernal tells the story of Ryan Lennox.  He is a former angel who is recruited by the forces of Hell to fight “Etherlight”, which is a heavenly secret agency.
results.name: Infernal

results.deck: The successor to Need for Speed: Most Wanted brought a continued storyline and new race types, but now with a lesser focus on police chases.
results.name: Need for Speed: Carbon

results.deck: The second game release from THQ based on Pixar's computer animated movie, Cars.
results.name: Disney/Pixar Cars: Mater-National Championship

results.deck: GUN is a third person action/adventure game setting you loose into 1800s America, where law is lost and crime runs rampant.
results.name: GUN

results.deck: NHL 2K6 was the first NHL game to hit next-gen consoles with a release on the Xbox360.
results.name: NHL 2K6

results.deck: Vampire Rain is a stealth game that has the player sneaking around and fighting vampires with modern weapons. It is best known for being universally panned by critics.
results.name: Vampire Rain

results.deck: On his 21st birthday, Jackie Estacado gets possessed by an entity known as The Darkness. After getting into trouble with the Mafia, Jackie finds himself on the run, trying to protect the people most important to him.
results.name: The Darkness

results.deck: A sci-fi themed real time strategy game for the PC and Xbox 360, featuring a structure of 3 unique factions (Ala Starcraft), and cross-platform multiplayer.
results.name: Universe at War: Earth Assault

results.deck: The final Moto GP game to be developed by Climax Racing Studios and published by THQ for the Xbox 360 and PC.
results.name: MotoGP '07

results.deck: When the beautiful Ann Darrow is kidnapped by the inhabitants of Skull Island, Jack and his team must fight their way through the island's prehistoric inhabitants and hostile environments, solving puzzles and fending off attackers, all in search of her. But unfortunately for them, so is a giant ape.
results.name: Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie

results.deck: Project Sylpheed is a space-age sci-fi shooter made in Japan for the Xbox 360. It follows the story of three pilots who were once friends, and the war that has separated them.
results.name: Project Sylpheed: Arc of Deception

results.deck: Be prepared to put those plastic, LEGO lightsabers to work as you rebel against the Galactic Empire in LucasArts' second installment of the LEGO Star Wars series.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy

results.deck: Players compete in monster truck rallies as well as races through large destructible environments as any of the big name trucks such as Big Foot, Gravedigger, Maximum Destruction, and even Monster Mutt!
results.name: Monster Jam

results.deck: Based loosely on the events of the motion picture, The Spiderwick Chronicles puts you in control as Jared, Simon and Mallory.
results.name: The Spiderwick Chronicles

results.deck: NBA 2K7 is the eighth installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2006/2007 NBA season while improving the online play and adding every athlete's "signature style".
results.name: NBA 2K7

results.deck: Rock Band expands on the concepts Harmonix established in its Guitar Hero franchise by allowing players to play guitar, bass, drums, and sing to a variety of songs from various sub-genres and time periods.
results.name: Rock Band

results.deck: UEFA Champions League 2006–2007 is the official video game of the UEFA Champions League 2006/2007 season.
results.name: UEFA Champions League 2006-2007

results.deck: The conclusion to the original Halo trilogy has the super-soldier Master Chief joining forces with The Arbiter to finish off the threat of both the remaining Covenant Empire and the parasitic Flood, once and for all.
results.name: Halo 3

results.deck: Bullet Witch is an action-adventure third-person shooter, which follows a young witch as she tries to save humanity from a demon army.
results.name: Bullet Witch

results.deck: Fight as an elite warrior who marches out into a thick of enemies, kill them all, and than repeat the process. The story of the war they wage is told through each fighter's unique point of view.
results.name: N3: Ninety-Nine Nights

results.deck: Subsistence is an updated version of Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater which contains several new features, most notably a third-person camera and an online mode, Metal Gear Online.  It is extremely hard to find in Europe, as Subsistence in EU is the US Subsistence Limited Edition by default.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence

results.deck: NBA Street Homecourt is the fourth game in the over-the-top basketball series by EA Sports BIG. It features a heavy emphasis on crazy tricks and even crazier dunks where teams of 3 compete to see who is truly the king of the court.
results.name: NBA Street Homecourt

results.deck: Fuzion Frenzy 2 is set around a game show with a large prize money on the line. Can you win for your planet?
results.name: Fuzion Frenzy 2

results.deck: Play as Will Turner, Elizabeth Swann, and the infamous Captain Jack Sparrow in this video game adaptation of the third film in the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise.
results.name: Disney's Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End

results.deck: Jericho is a horror-themed FPS from the mind of screen legend Clive Barker. In the game, a Jericho Team must fight through a lost city to destroy the evil at its heart.
results.name: Clive Barker's Jericho

results.deck: Eternal Sonata is a fantasy RPG developed by tri-Crescendo and 8-4 Ltd. that tells an alternate history story of Frédéric Chopin's final moments.
results.name: Eternal Sonata

results.deck: Enter the Shivering Isles, the lands ruled by the Daedric Prince of Madness, Sheogorath. Battle your way through the twisted landscape, become the champion of Sheogorath, and help save the isles from the destructive Greymarch.
results.name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Shivering Isles

results.deck: Control war machines in the air or on the sea in this World War II naval warfare game from Eidos.
results.name: Battlestations: Midway

results.deck: Unreal Tournament III is a fast-paced arena-based shooter, introducing the world to Unreal Engine 3 while including a story-based single-player campaign that mixes the Liandri Tournament with all-out war.
results.name: Unreal Tournament 3

results.deck: Hitman: Blood Money is a 3rd person action-adventure game released by Eidos in 2006. The game is a continuation of the popular Hitman franchise in which the player takes control of the mysterious assassin, Agent 47.
results.name: Hitman: Blood Money

results.deck: The second expansion in the Final Fantasy XI Online series.
results.name: Final Fantasy XI Online: Chains of Promathia

results.deck: In this unsuccessful reboot of the Turok franchise, space marine Joseph Turok must hunt down his former mentor and fight for survival on an alien planet filled with hostile soldiers, genetically-engineered dinosaurs, and other dangerous monsters.
results.name: Turok

results.deck: EA Sports brings its NASCAR series to the Seventh Generation gaming consoles with NASCAR 08.
results.name: NASCAR 08

results.deck: Super Returns is an open world tie-in to the film. It features story missions based on saving the city of Metropolis, and 80 square miles of free roaming goodness. Also, the final boss battle is a tornado.
results.name: Superman Returns

results.deck: This family friendly game combines Lego Star Wars, and Lego Star Wars: The Original Trilogy, into one adventure spanning the entire Star Wars universe.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga

results.deck: Join over 500,000 people from across the globe in the world of Vana'diel for your very own Final Fantasy adventure in the series' first foray into the MMORPG genre.
results.name: Final Fantasy XI Online

results.deck: This RPG focuses on a band of warriors attempting to stop the Queen of Ice from resurrecting ancient golems which could destroy the world. The game is similar in formula to Final Fantasy titles and uses randomly triggered encounters.
results.name: Enchanted Arms

results.deck: Take a handfull of suped up cars, throw a few oversized guns on them, then make them race to the finish line, and you've got Full Auto.
results.name: Full Auto

results.deck: Namco's popular collect-a-thon returns for another outing exclusively on the Xbox 360.
results.name: Beautiful Katamari

results.deck: The third entry in the Soul series, and being the first to release on all major home consoles. SC II was also the first in the series to introduce exclusive cameos from other franchises.
results.name: Soulcalibur II

results.deck: A multiplayer mini-game collection starring characters from the Viva Piñata TV Show.
results.name: Viva Piñata: Party Animals

results.deck: Luxor 2 is an Egyptian Puzzle Shooter from Mumbo Jumbo. Accuracy is the key. as you shoot colored marbles into ongoing chains of marbles getting sucked into a hole. You must match three of more marbles of the same color together for a combo.
results.name: Luxor 2

results.deck: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix lets the player control characters from the book and movie of the same name around a recreated Hogwarts castle, using magic and performing tasks along the way.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

results.deck: Tony Hawk's Project 8 was the first game in the Tony Hawk series built from the ground up for 7th generation of consoles. The game introduced the Nail-The-Trick mechanic and added graphical details like Bloom HDR lighting and ragdoll physics.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Project 8

results.deck: What if Winston Churchill was killed in an accident before World War II began? What if the war wouldn't have ended? Spark Unlimited's Turning Point adds an alternate history scenario to the well-populated subgenre.
results.name: Turning Point: Fall of Liberty

results.deck: Stuntman: Ignition lets you live out the dream of getting paid to drive recklessly and with no concern for the law as you help film stunts for fictional movies.
results.name: Stuntman: Ignition

results.deck: Gears of War is a tactical cover-based sci-fi shooter from Epic Games. The player controls Marcus Fenix, a COG soldier who fights the Locust aliens defending their home planet from the encroaching Human invaders.
results.name: Gears of War

results.deck: The follow-up to the 1998 blockbuster, Metal Gear Solid 2 blends tactical stealth and action. This sequel takes the action to an offshore oil cleanup facility seized by terrorists who are holding the President hostage. It helped sell the PS2, featuring advanced AI, physics and cover mechanics for its time, and one of the first postmodern narratives in gaming.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty

results.deck: The second game in the 'Soul' franchise, it takes place three years after Soul Edge/Soul Blade.
results.name: Soulcalibur

results.deck: A college basketball game from 2K Sports.
results.name: College Hoops 2K6

results.deck: WWE Smackdown vs. Raw 2008 is an iteration in the Smackdown vs Raw series. This version included Fighting Styles and a new struggle submission system as well as the ECW brand.
results.name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2008

results.deck: It's all female wrestling in Rumble Roses XX, the sequel to Rumble Roses.
results.name: Rumble Roses XX

results.deck: Cruise the streets of Rockport City, keep away from the cops, and defeat the wily Razor Callahan in this open-street racing game from EA Black Box.
results.name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted

results.deck: The seventh rendition of the popular, long running soccer simulator Pro Evolution Soccer. The game is available on PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, PlayStation Portable, Wii, Nintendo DS, Xbox 360, and PC.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2008

results.deck: Become the Don by extorting businesses, racketeering, whacking rivals and starting gang wars across the whole of New York City. Welcome to the family.
results.name: The Godfather: The Game

results.deck: A visual novel game released in 2002 that focuses on a group of people who are trapped in an undersea theme park. Mysterious happenings are abound and time is running out so the group must band together to escape alive.
results.name: Ever17: The Out of Infinity

results.deck: Gain Ground is a tactical top-down shooter, originally released in arcades. It was later ported to the Master System, Genesis and Tubrografx-16 CD.
results.name: Gain Ground

results.deck: This is a direct sequel to Quake 2, which casts the player as another Space Marine continuing the war against the Strogg.
results.name: Quake 4

results.deck: In Blazing Angels, you take the role of an American pilot and fly, shoot, and bomb your way through the German army along with some American buddies. The game "Secret Weapons Over Normandy" was cited by the developer as a big influence on this games development.
results.name: Blazing Angels: Squadrons of WWII

results.deck: Return to the roots of filmmaker John Woo's "heroic bloodshed" films of the early 90s (with elements such as dual-wielding pistols and over-the-top "kung-fu with guns") in John Woo Presents Stranglehold.
results.name: John Woo Presents Stranglehold

results.deck: A re-release of Dark Messiah of Might and Magic for the Xbox 360. Elements differs from the original in both content and gameplay systems, reducing the RPG elements considerably.
results.name: Dark Messiah of Might and Magic: Elements

results.deck: Doom 3, a more story-focused remake of the original Doom, is a sci-fi first-person-shooter that was widely considered the most graphically advanced game available for its time.
results.name: Doom 3

results.deck: Perfect Dark Zero is the prequel to the critically-acclaimed futuristic first-person shooter, Perfect Dark. You play the role of bounty hunter Joanna Dark, uncovering conspiracies about the dataDyne Corporation.
results.name: Perfect Dark Zero

results.deck: Open Season is a 3rd person plat-former based on the movie by the same name. Developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft.
results.name: Open Season

results.deck: Scramble is a side-scrolling shooter. The player controls a spaceship across a scrolling terrain, battling obstacles along the way. Scramble is credited with setting the template for most of the side-scrolling shooters that followed its release.
results.name: Scramble

results.deck: Two Worlds is an Action Role Playing Game in which you explore the world of Antaloor, solving quests and making choices that affect the world around you.
results.name: Two Worlds

results.deck: Guitar Hero II is the second entry into Harmonix's popular Guitar Hero franchise, adding more songs and several new gameplay features as well as bringing the franchise to the Xbox 360.
results.name: Guitar Hero II

results.deck: Illegal Japanese highway racing makes a next-gen debut in this quirky, street racing video game.
results.name: Import Tuner Challenge

results.deck: Splatterhouse is a remarkably gory, splatter-themed arcade game from 1988. The player controls Rick Taylor, who allows himself to be possessed by the sinister "Terror Mask" in an attempt to save his girlfriend Jennifer from the hideous monsters who have kidnapped her.
results.name: Splatterhouse

results.deck: Hour of Victory is a World War II-themed first-person shooter. Calling it mediocre would be a compliment.
results.name: Hour of Victory

results.deck: The Outfit is a squad based 3rd person shooter set during WWII in Europe as you have the choice of taking control of three different characters, commanding their squads, calling in destruction and defeating the Nazi war machine.
results.name: The Outfit

results.deck: The series returns again with sharper looking graphics and a slicker control scheme.
results.name: Brian Lara International Cricket 2007

results.deck: Monster Madness is an action adventure game following a group of teens as they fight to rid their town of an undead menace.
results.name: Monster Madness: Battle for Suburbia

results.deck: The story of a young, curious, and green-loving photojournalist named Jade, out to unravel an alien conspiracy on her home planet of Hillys.
results.name: Beyond Good & Evil

results.deck: Naruto: Rise of a Ninja is an open world fighting hybrid, with elements of role playing. It's based on the popular anime series Naruto.
results.name: Naruto: Rise of a Ninja

results.deck: Play as one of the Dead or Alive ladies in this volleyball and mini-game collection.
results.name: Dead or Alive: Xtreme 2

results.deck: Aliens turned Tommy's world upside down. It's about time he returned the favor.
results.name: Prey

results.deck: The fourth installment to the Burnout series, Revenge expands on the fast-paced racing series by adding new features such as same-way Traffic Checking, Vertical Takedowns, Traffic Attack mode, and changes to Crash mode.
results.name: Burnout Revenge

results.deck: Madden NFL 07 was the first version of Madden to appear on the Wii and the PS3.  It also added lead blocking controls along with numerous other new features.
results.name: Madden NFL 07

results.deck: Transform and roll out with many of the characters from the live-action movie in this epic action game.
results.name: Transformers: The Game

results.deck: A Xbox 360 snowboarding game. The game is known for featuring a wide variety of bizarre cutscenes; including sock puppets, anime-style animation, fake advertisements and video game parodies.
results.name: Amped 3

results.deck: Def Jam: Icon is a fighting game that has rappers in place of the standard fighting game fare.
results.name: Def Jam: Icon

results.deck: A ping pong game from the creators of Grand Theft Auto and Manhunt. It doesn't contain sex, violence or any sort of controversy. What it does contain though is a really good ping pong game.
results.name: Rockstar Games presents Table Tennis

results.deck: A disc containing six different Xbox Live Arcade games that was sold in stores rather than on the Xbox Live Marketplace.
results.name: Xbox Live Arcade Unplugged Volume 1

results.deck: When humanity is still a newcomer on the futuristic galactic stage, it's up to the charismatic Commander Shepard to investigate the actions of a rogue agent in the first chapter of the Mass Effect trilogy.
results.name: Mass Effect

results.deck: A serpentine game of colour-matching attrition from PopCap
results.name: Zuma

results.deck: Ready your racket for the second outing of 2K Sports' series. This game was considered the best tennis simulator of it's time, and it definitely does its predecessor justice.
results.name: Top Spin 2

results.deck: MotoGP'06 is a motorcycle racing game under the Motogp Championship license developed by Climax Studios and published by THQ. It was released on June 9th (Pal) and June 12th (NA) exclusively for the Xbox 360.
results.name: MotoGP '06

results.deck: Venture into the mysterious, Utopian city of Rapture and discover what exactly has gone wrong in this first-person epic.
results.name: BioShock

results.deck: Command & Conquer 3 reintroduces the world to the ongoing struggle between GDI and the Brotherhood of NOD, but this time an alien force known as the Scrin is getting involved, too.
results.name: Command & Conquer 3: Tiberium Wars

results.deck: Armored Core 4 pits the player over a variety of missions in which they must customize their mech to achieve victory over 5 chapters. Players can take their own mech online and battle against other players in team deathmatch or free for all combat.
results.name: Armored Core 4

results.deck: The Orange Box is a video game compilation that packages Half-Life 2 (including Episode 1 and Episode 2), Team Fortress 2, and Portal into one.
results.name: The Orange Box

results.deck: On a frozen planet, one man fights the elements, ice pirates, and gigantic, hostile insectoid aliens to avenge the murder of his father and regain his lost memories.
results.name: Lost Planet: Extreme Condition

results.deck: The third installment in the Metal Gear Solid franchise is swathed in the Cold War, and it's up to a strangely familiar soldier codenamed Naked Snake to keep the Soviet Union and the United States from all-out nuclear war.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater

results.deck: The 2007 release of the Need for Speed series and the 11th installment of the popular racing game franchise.
results.name: Need for Speed: ProStreet

results.deck: Just Cause is an open-world action game that has you play as Rico Rodriguez, a black-ops agent helping guerrillas to overthrow the government of San Esperito.
results.name: Just Cause

results.deck: NHL 08 takes the simulation of hockey video games to the next level by adding more precise stick handling, and an all new deke button that allows you to separate the puck from your player to skate around defencemen and get scoring chances.
results.name: NHL 08

results.deck: The BIGS is a baseball game developed by 2K Sports. It focuses more on being over the top (giant muscles, long home runs, fast pitches) instead of being a simulator.
results.name: The BIGS

results.deck: Thrillville: Off the Rails is a theme park simulation video game developed by Frontier Developments. The sequel to the 2006 game Thrillville, it is again published by LucasArts. It was released in North America on October 16, 2007.
results.name: Thrillville: Off the Rails
